aboutpara: Passionate and resourceful CS grad with hands-on experience in full stack development and predictive modeling . Demonstrated ability in UI design and coding user-centric applications. Proficient in various programming languages and frameworks including Python, JavaScript, React, React Native and Node. Proven leadership skills through managing college clubs and driving successful initiatives. Committed to continuous learning and exploring innovative solutions to real-world challenges.

resume.description: Enthusiastic CSE fresher skilled in full stack development and problem solving. Excels in research, predictive modeling, and crafting user-friendly apps. Proficient in Python, JavaScript, React, React Native, and Node. A natural leader with a passion for innovation and problem-solving.

experiences.position: Research and Development Intern at IIT Madras
experiences.bullets: Developed a Vessel Management System and communication app, boosting real-time coordination by 30%, and implemented a predictive tide model using advanced ML algorithms.

experiences.position: Software Development Intern at Tech Mahindra
experiences.bullets: Developed a worker detection model to enhance workplace safety and achieved 85% accuracy in a car defect detection model through collaborative data preprocessing and model training.

education.universityName: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
